file_content.text: You need to see this.
Hey, come here quick!
The attack claimed the lives of a delegation of Jedi and Republic officials on Nar Shaddaa.
The apprehension of the individual responsible for these continued acts of aggression is our top priority.
Senators, I assure you, the orchestrators of these attacks will be made to account for them.
Oh, we are so--that was the Supreme Chancellor of the Republic!
Mako, start digging. There's more to this than dead Jedi.
I need answers.
Think he's the one behind this mess?
What's his interest in me?
I hope not. He holds a lot of power. Let's see what's buzzing around the HoloNet... oh, we are in real trouble.
Just another chump with a fancy title.
Big deal.
That "chump" is the most powerful man in the Republic! We need to find out what's going on, fast... oh, crud.
Why did the Supreme Chancellor of the Republic just give an address about you?
I'd like to know the same thing. Start digging.
Good question.
I'm on it.... This is bad, real bad.
That Jedi from Quesh tried to arrest me again. I guess this was the backup plan.
Because we're in big trouble.
If that's true, that Jedi has some serious pull. Let me see what I can dig up.... Oh yeah, it's true.
Delegation my eye. This is a frame-up.
Because he's a lying rat.
There's got to be more to this... uh... I think "frame-up" is selling it short.
The Republic just placed you at the top of its most wanted list. The list of charges is a kilometer long!
Bombing an arms factory resulting in more than twelve hundred civilian deaths, massacring an entire Taris resettlement colony, pillaging the Royal Museum of Alderaan....
Massacring an entire Taris resettlement colony, hijacking shuttles of refugees and selling them into slavery....
Ransacking the Royal Museum of Alderaan, trafficking of disrupter-class weaponry, possession of biological weapons....
Bombing an arms factory on Nar Shaddaa, claiming the lives of more than twelve hundred workers....
Destroying the cruiser Aurora, resulting in the loss of her entire crew including the Jedi Master Kellian Jarro....
Assassinating the Senator of Ithor, sabotage resulting in the destruction of the ecosystem of Vo... it just keeps going.
Half of this stuff we didn't even do!
Dragging my reputation through the mud. That's low.
They're making me a scapegoat.
I haven't gotten to the part where they're pitting our own kind against us.
I'll clear my name. That's a promise.
They won't get away with this.
What do I care what the Republic says about me?
Let them talk.
It's not so much what they're saying.
If they think I'll let them pin all this on me, they've got another think coming.
I'm nobody's scapegoat.
I don't think they plan to let you dispute the charges.
That ought to make people think twice about crossing me.
So? It makes me intimidating.
Uh, I wouldn't be so sure about that....
They want to make me a monster, I'll play the part.
Time to expand that list then.
I know you're mad, but I really don't think you want to draw anymore attention to yourself.
They're offering a ten million credit bounty for your capture.
We're leaving. Nar Shaddaa's a bad place to be with a price on your head.
It isn't safe here.
No kidding. For that many credits, every desperate dreg on this moon's gonna try to take a shot at us.
Figures, the best bounty in the galaxy's the only one I can't claim.
Nice touch of irony.
Mom would be proud.
Ten million? Not too shabby.
Congratulations, that's more than every price on my head combined.
Better get off Nar Shaddaa.
Kid's right. Every two-credit hood on this moon's gonna be gunning for us.
Before you plot a destination... it gets worse.
Accusations are flying all over the HoloNet, and Imperial officials are making a big show of burning any bridges between us.
I don't know what the Empire's idea of "full cooperation" is, but laying low in Imperial space is looking a lot less likely.
The Empire's hung us out to dry. Find us a place off the grid.
We're going underground.
Braden was the one with the contacts, but I'll find some--
We're looking real short on friends right now. Where do we go?
Let's hear ideas, people.
Blizz still have friends in Jawa clan.
Here's how we play this. Get in tight with the Hutts. You've got pull with them and ten mil wouldn't even make them blink.
Become Hutt lackeys? Pass.
Maybe boss trade for room on sandcrawler?
Kid, I've been ducking poetic justice since before you were born. Butt out.
Guys. Guys. Guys! We just got a high-priority communication.
We've got enough problems. Play nice.
Quit antagonizing him, Gault.
You gonna hit him or stare at him all day?
Waiting for something, Torian?
What's the message, Mako?
Let's hear it.
Should be safe with our own kind.
Could create friction between the Mandalorians and the Empire.
Maybe. It's risky.
We don't answer to them.
Even Jedi'd think twice about messing with the Mandalorians.
Good idea.
What about my people?
Mandalore won't be real receptive to doing me any favors.
Doubtful.
Suppose I could bury the hatchet.
Maybe. It'd take some work.
I won't go crawling to Mandalore for help.
No way.
Who's begging?
Maybe boss trade for room on sandcrawler?
Hold that--we just got a high-priority communication.
My hit list is getting so long I don't know where to start.
They're dead. All of them.
Let's just get out of here. We can plan the rampage later.
Actually, we might not get to plan it at all. Take a look at this.
It's an Imperial summons. We're to rendezvous with an Imperial fleet in the Outer Rim, to discuss our "recent activities."
"Discussion." Yeah, I bet.
It doesn't sound like a request.
